note: #ArchLinux and general #opensource user. Been using #Linux since 2001ish. Had a Nokia N800, N950 prior and #Jolla with #SailfishOS as a mainphone until 2018. I like tech a lot but not as much as I used to. Has become interested in #Solarpunk. I like tech that is good for mankind. Was pretty much Google free. Haven't used Facebook or Twitter in decades. I am a father. My work is within health care and psychiatry. My interests are very broad... I cover pretty much all the bases. ;)

fields.name: Masto life:
fields.value: (Joined Mastodon 2017 from mstdn.io; Moved to this instance 2022)

fields.name: Other interests:
fields.value: psychiatry, medicine, technology, society, science, history, biology, antropology, sociology
